sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The tar package contains the rmt and tar programs.

sect3.title: rmt
sect3.para: rmt is a program used by the remote dump and restore programs in manipulating a magnetic tape drive through an interprocess communication connection.

sect3.title: tar
sect3.para: tar is an archiving program designed to store and extract files from an archive file known as a tar file.
